msg.name: search

msg.content:
Based on my research, I can tell you about the six major metropolitan cities of South Korea and their symbol flowers:

1. Seoul (서울) - The city flower is the Forsythia
2. Busan (부산) - The city flower is the Camellia
3. Incheon (인천) - The city flower is the Rose
4. Daegu (대구) - The city flower is the Azalea
5. Gwangju (광주) - The city flower is the Crepe Myrtle
6. Daejeon (대전) - The city flower is the Korean Forsythia

Note: There is actually a seventh metropolitan city in South Korea - Ulsan, whose city flower is the Rose of Sharon (Mugunghwa), which is also the national flower of South Korea.

Each of these cities has been designated as a metropolitan city (광역시, Gwangyeoksi) due to their significant population and economic importance. These cities have administrative status equal to that of provinces.

1. Seoul (서울) - The city flower is the Forsythia
2. Busan (부산) - The city flower is the Camellia
3. Incheon (인천) - The city flower is the Rose
4. Daegu (대구) - The city flower is the Azalea
5. Gwangju (광주) - The city flower is the Crepe Myrtle
6. Daejeon (대전) - The city flower is the Korean Forsythia

Note: There is actually a seventh metropolitan city in South Korea - Ulsan, whose city flower is the Rose of Sharon (Mugunghwa), which is also the national flower of South Korea.

Each of these cities has been designated as a metropolitan city (광역시, Gwangyeoksi) due to their significant population and economic importance. These cities have administrative status equal to that of provinces.
